price: (53) Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction?"
arabic: فَلَوۡلَآ أُلۡقِيَ عَلَيۡهِ أَسۡوِرَةٞ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوۡ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ مُقۡتَرِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: falawlā ul'qiya ʿalayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jāa maʿahu al-malāikatu muq'tarinīna
